functions.name: reqCookieToParams
functions.description: Converts the 'Cookie' request header value string to Params object.

functions.name: reqCookieFromParams
functions.description: Converts a Params object to a string suitable for setting 'Cookie' request header value.

functions.name: resCookieToObject
functions.description: Converts a cookie from a 'Set-Cookie' response header value to an object.

functions.name: resCookieFromObject
functions.description: Converts an Object to a string suitable for setting 'Set-Cookie' response header value.

functions.name: resCookiesToObjectMap
functions.description: Converts an array of response cookies to a map of cookie objects.

functions.name: resCookiesFromObjectMap
functions.description: Converts a map of cookie objects to an array of cookie strings suitable for setting 'Set-Cookie' response header values.
